title: AppSheet expert with experience integrating Zendesk / Salesforce / BigQuery
description: We are seeking an experienced AppSheet developer to create a user-friendly 'to-do list' app tailored for various stakeholders within our company. The app should facilitate task management and integrate seamlessly with Zendesk / Salesforce / BiqQuery. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of AppSheet, and UI/UX design principles. We will start with an MVP version and then progress to add features.
